ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A method for determining groups in multiple curves with an automatic selection of their number based on k-means or k-medians algorithms. The selection of the optimal number is provided by bootstrap methods. The methodology can be applied both in regression and survival framework. Implemented methods are: Grouping multiple survival curves described by Villanueva et al. (2018) <doi:10.1002/sim.8016>.

A method for determining groups in multiple curves with an automatic selection of their number based on k-means or k-medians algorithms. The selection of the optimal number is provided by bootstrap methods. The methodology can be applied both in regression and survival framework. Implemented methods are: Grouping multiple survival curves described by Villanueva et al. (2018) <doi:10.1002/sim.8016>.

name: r-clustcurv
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.0.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-clustcurv
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/clustcurv_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/clustcurv/clustcurv_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 055aa632b44cb2e2f79645fa29d5257c8b419e468c782c325195694f5ec728d2

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-gmedian
    - r-rcolorbrewer
    - r-doparallel
    - r-dorng
    - r-foreach
    - r-ggfortify
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-npregfast
    - r-survival
    - r-survminer
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-gmedian
    - r-rcolorbrewer
    - r-doparallel
    - r-dorng
    - r-foreach
    - r-ggfortify
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-npregfast
    - r-survival
    - r-survminer

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('clustcurv')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('clustcurv')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/noramvillanueva/clustcurv
  license: MIT
  summary: 'A method for determining groups in multiple curves with an automatic selection of their number based on k-means or k-medians algorithms. The selection of the optimal number is provided by bootstrap methods. The methodology can be applied both in regression and survival framework. Implemented methods are: Grouping
    multiple survival curves described by Villanueva et al. (2018) <doi:10.1002/sim.8016>.'
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
